sentences.en: A baker is kneading a dough.
sentences.cn: 一位面包师正在揉面团。

sentences.en: Add enough milk to form a soft dough.
sentences.cn: 加入足量的牛奶，使面团变得柔软。

sentences.en: Add more water until the dough is workable.
sentences.cn: 往面团里再加点儿水，直到能揉成形为止。

sentences.en: Add some raisins to the dough.
sentences.cn: 在生面团中加一些葡萄干。

sentences.en: Add the remaining flour to make a soft dough.
sentences.cn: 把剩下的面粉加进去做成一块软面团.

sentences.en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.
sentences.cn: 用茶匙把生面团舀到烤盘上。

sentences.en: Flatten the dough with a press of the hand.
sentences.cn: 用手把生面团压平.

sentences.en: Gluten develops elasticity in a dough.
sentences.cn: 麸质使生面团有韧劲。

sentences.en: He worked hard for his dough.
sentences.cn: 他努力工作挣钱。

sentences.en: Knead the dough on a floured surface.
sentences.cn: 在撒了面粉的案板上揉面团。

sentences.en: Knead the dough very lightly.
sentences.cn: 轻轻地揉面团。

sentences.en: Refrigerate the dough overnight.
sentences.cn: 将面团冷藏过夜。

sentences.en: Roll out the dough into one large circle.
sentences.cn: 将面团擀成大的圆形面皮。

sentences.en: Roll the dough on a lightly floured surface.
sentences.cn: 揉生面团时，案板上要撒点面粉。

sentences.en: She formed the dough into squares.
sentences.cn: 她把生面团捏成四方块.

sentences.en: She patted the dough into a flat cake.
sentences.cn: 她把面团轻轻拍成扁饼。

sentences.en: She was kneading a lumpen mass of dough.
sentences.cn: 她正揉着一大块面团。

sentences.en: So he skipped from the oven & into bread dough all ready to rise in the night kitchen.
sentences.cn: 于是，他从烤箱里跳出来，跳进生面团，整个人连着生面团在深夜厨房里飞起来。

sentences.en: Suzanne likes the feel of the dough as she makes bread.
sentences.cn: 苏珊娜喜欢制造面包时的生面团的那种感觉。

sentences.en: The dough would sour quickly in such weather.
sentences.cn: 在这种天气生面团会很快发酵。

sentences.en: Turn out the dough on to a floured surface.
sentences.cn: 把生面团倒在撒了面粉的案板上。

words.tran_cn: 面团似的；柔软的；苍白的；半熟的

trans.tran_cn: （用于制作面包等的）生面团，钱，现款
trans.tran_en: a mixture of flour and water ready to be baked into bread,  pastry  etc
